properties.name: micro-service.starter.web.enabled
properties.description: 是否启用 starter-web

properties.name: micro-service.starter.web.basic-error-enabled
properties.description: 是否启用 CustomBasicErrorController，覆盖 http 404 处理逻辑

properties.name: micro-service.starter.web.enableWebMvcConfig
properties.description: 是否启用 WebMvcConfig 配置类

properties.name: micro-service.starter.web.logging.requestResponseLog
properties.description: 是否打印request、responseBody日志

properties.name: micro-service.starter.web.logging.requestLog
properties.description: 是否打印request日志，requestResponseLog、requestLog 有一个是true，就打印request日志

properties.name: micro-service.starter.web.logging.responseBodyLog
properties.description: 是否打印responseBody日志，requestResponseBodyLog、responseBodyLog 有一个是true，就打印responseBody日志

properties.name: micro-service.starter.web.logging.includeHeaders
properties.description: 是否包含请求头信息

properties.name: micro-service.starter.web.cors.allow-credentials
properties.description: Whether credentials are supported. When not set, credentials are not supported.

properties.name: micro-service.starter.web.cors.allowed-origin-patterns
properties.description: Comma-separated list of origin patterns to allow. Unlike allowed origins which only supports '*', origin patterns are more flexible (for example 'https://*.example.com') and can be used when credentials are allowed. When no allowed origin patterns or allowed origins are set, CORS support is disabled.

properties.name: micro-service.starter.web.cors.allowed-headers
properties.description: Comma-separated list of headers to allow in a request. '*' allows all headers.

properties.name: micro-service.starter.web.cors.allowed-methods
properties.description: Comma-separated list of methods to allow. '*' allows all methods. When not set, defaults to GET.

properties.name: micro-service.starter.web.cors.max-age
properties.description: How long the response from a pre-flight request can be cached by clients. If a duration suffix is not specified, seconds will be used.

properties.name: micro-service.starter.web.work-weixin.enable
properties.description: 是否启用企业微信

properties.name: micro-service.starter.web.work-weixin.key
properties.description: 企业微信机器人webhook-url key

properties.name: micro-service.starter.web.work-weixin.contentMaxLength
properties.description: 信息最大长度，最多4000个字符

properties.name: micro-service.starter.web.work-weixin.title
properties.description: 标题

properties.name: micro-service.starter.web.work-weixin.titleColor
properties.description: 标题颜色（只支持3种内置颜色） info 绿色 comment 灰色 warning 橙红色

properties.name: micro-service.starter.web.ding-talk.enable
properties.description: 是否启用钉钉机器人

properties.name: micro-service.starter.web.ding-talk.contentMaxLength
properties.description: 信息最大长度

properties.name: micro-service.starter.web.ding-talk.title
properties.description: 标题

properties.name: micro-service.starter.web.ding-talk.secret
properties.description: 加签

properties.name: micro-service.starter.web.ding-talk.accessToken
properties.description: access_token
